topic.title: What is troubleshooting?
topic.shortdesc: Troubleshooting information provides corrective actions for changing the state of a product or a system to a state that is more desirable.

body.p: Troubleshooting information can be brief, consisting of just a few sentences. Brief troubleshooting information is embedded within tasks or descriptions. Alternatively, troubleshooting information might be extensive. In these cases, the information warrants an entire topic.
